name: Peter Robert SEAMON, Appellant v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (SARNO & SON FORMALS), Appellees
name_abbreviation: Seamon v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before: FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
Former Chief Justice FLAHERTY and former Chief Justice ZAPPALA did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: Peter Robert SEAMON, Appellant v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (SARNO & SON FORMALS), Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
■ AND NOW, this 19th day of February, 2003, the appeal is hereby DISMISSED as improvidently granted.
Former Chief Justice FLAHERTY and former Chief Justice ZAPPALA did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John T. Kupchinsky, Irwin William Ar-onson, Camp Hill, for Peter Robert Seam-on, Appellant.
James A. Holzman, Harrisburg, Amber Marie Kenger, Mechanicsburg, for W.C.A.B., Appellee.
Jerome Dunham, Robert T. Panowiez, Mountain Top, for Sarno & Son Formáis, Appellee.

Decided Feb. 19, 2003.
